amendment.description: An amendment numbered 334 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to increase and decrease by $2 million the Federal Railroad Administration Safety and Operations account to highlight the need to conduct a joint FRA-FHWA pedestrian/motorist/stud nt safety study on the high speed rail corridor running from Miami to Orlando through Indian River County, FL.
